name: cifti-average-roi-correlation
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
CORRELATE ROI AVERAGE WITH ALL ROWS THEN AVERAGE ACROSS SUBJECTS.

Averages rows for each map of the ROI(s), takes the correlation of each ROI average to the rest of the rows in the same file, applies the fisher small z transform, then averages the results across all files.  ROIs are always treated as weighting functions, including negative values.  For efficiency, ensure that everything that is not intended to be used is zero in the ROI map.  If -cifti-roi is specified, -left-roi, -right-roi, -cerebellum-roi, and -vol-roi must not be specified.  If multiple non-cifti ROI files are specified, they must have the same number of columns.

inputs.name: opt_cifti_roi_roi_cifti
inputs.description: cifti file containing combined weights: the roi cifti file

inputs.name: opt_left_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: weights to use for left hempsphere: the left roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_right_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: weights to use for right hempsphere: the right roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: weights to use for cerebellum surface: the cerebellum roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_vol_roi_roi_vol
inputs.description: voxel weights to use: the roi volume file

inputs.name: opt_left_area_surf_left_surf
inputs.description: specify the left surface for vertex area correction: the left surface file

inputs.name: opt_right_area_surf_right_surf
inputs.description: specify the right surface for vertex area correction: the right surface file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_area_surf_cerebellum_surf
inputs.description: specify the cerebellum surface for vertex area correction: the cerebellum surface file

inputs.name: opt_cifti_cifti_in
inputs.description: specify an input cifti file: a cifti file to average across
